actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution disapproving proposed regulations of the Department of the Treasury requiring centralized governmental registration of firearms.

summary.text: Declares (1) that the Department of the Treasury does not possess authority to implement certain proposed firearms transaction reporting regulations, (2) that such proposed additional recordkeeping requirements serve no useful purpose and are wasteful, and (3) that the Department must seek explicit congressional authorization before proposing any rules or regulations for centralizing records required under existing firearms law.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving proposed regulations of the Department of the Treasury requiring centralized governmental registration of firearms.
